articles.author: Ariel Edwards-Levy
articles.title: Americans largely oppose Trump’s ramp-up of deportations, CNN poll finds - CNN
articles.description: Americans largely oppose recent efforts by Donald Trump’s administration to scale up its deportation program, a new CNN poll conducted by SSRS finds, with a rising majority saying the president has gone too far in carrying out deportations.
articles.content: Americans largely oppose recent efforts by Donald Trumps administration to scale up its deportation program, a new CNN poll conducted by SSRS finds, with a rising majority saying the president has go… [+5726 chars]
